availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Shepherdsville post office, Bullitt County, KY. A Kentucky-born laborer. Private, Company C, 26th Regiment Kentucky Infantry. Mustered in 3 Oct 1864, Owensboro, KY. A substitute.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District 3, Shepherdsville post office, p. 130.
National Park Service. U.S. Civil War Soldiers, 1861-1865 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2007.
